mapper.insert: INSERT INTO repair_shop_request (name, road_address, lot_address, registration_date, open_time, close_time, tel_number, request_user_id, status) VALUES (#{name}, #{road_address}, #{lot_address}, #{registration_date}, #{open_time}, #{close_time}, #{tel_number}, #{request_user_id}, #{status})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM repair_shop_request WHERE status = 'PENDING' ORDER BY id DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE repair_shop_request SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
